data.name: Warframe: Toxic Flight Pack
data.detailed_description:
The Toxic Flight Pack allows you to advance Warframe at breakneck speeds with generous amounts of Platinum, Credits, Mod Cards, Movement upgrades and Boosters.

750 Platinum to use towards new Warframes, Weapons, Equipment and more
100,000 Credits to assist in making new upgrades to your arsenal
10 Random Mod Cards to instantly upgrade your arsenal
6 Rare Mod Cards to add hard-to-find modifications to your inventory
Rending Turn Exilus Mod increases the speed of Bullet Jump, lengthens the duration of Aim Glide and Wall Latch, and adds Slash damage to Bullet Jump
Ice Spring Exilus Mod increases the speed of Bullet Jump, lengthens the duration of Aim Glide and Wall Latch, and adds Cold damage to Bullet Jump
Toxic Flight Exilus Mod increases the speed of Bullet Jump, lengthens the duration of Aim Glide and Wall Latch, and adds Toxin damage to Bullet Jump
3 Exilus Adapter to instantly unlock a Exilus Mod Slot for Mobility and Utility advancements
3-Day Resource and Drop Chance Booster to double the chance and amount of pickups for 3 days
3-Day Affinity and Credit Booster to quickly level up your arsenal

data.short_description: The Toxic Flight Pack allows you to advance Warframe at breakneck speeds with generous amounts of Platinum, Credits, Mod Cards, Movement upgrades and Boosters.
data.supported_languages:
English*, German, French, Italian, Korean, Spanish, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese-Brazil, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Windows XP SP 3 or higher
  • Processor:Intel Core 2 Duo e6400 or AMD Athlon x64 4000+
  • Memory:2 GB RAM
  • Graphics:Nvidia GeForce 8600 GT or ATI Radeon HD 3600
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:10 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
